messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Family Dinners was Re: video games
messages.msgSnippet: We can have a family sit-down dinner if we WANT to but not because we want to hear about each others days. ******* We also no longer have Family Sit Down
messages.messageBody:
We can have a family sit-down dinner if we WANT to but not
because we want to hear about each others days.
*******
We also no longer have "Family Sit Down Dinners" (Dum dum DUM) either although as my kids have gotten older and their social lives are much more active, we'll occasionally notice that, "Hey, everyone is home! Let's sit at the table and eat dinner!" LOL
No requirements, no coersion. Just for fun.

Elissa Jill
OTN:
silk/wool blend tie front mini sweater
Sparkly dressy scarf

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
